overview:
Jared LaSante first joined the team when he joined Fusion Creative Inc as a 3D animator. He quickly rose through the ranks and obtained the title of Production Director overseeing a slate of animation projects. As the company expanded into the video game sector, Mr. LaSante lead the efforts on creating Fusion Creativeâ€™s first game design, trailer and pitch for the newly formed Fusion Creative Studios Inc. After devoting many hours in and out of work Mr. LaSante was promoted to Chief Technology Officer of Fusion Creative Studios.

Mr. LaSante graduated from Quinnipiac University with degrees in Computer Science and Interactive Digital Design and currently sits on the Computer Science Advisory Board at Quinnipiac, Rhino Mobile and Climadix mobile marketing companies.
